scripts.build: npm-run-all -p build:root build:workspaces && npm run copy-static
scripts.copy-static: cpx "css/**" _site/css && cpx "bexarvoting/**" _site/bexarvoting && cpx "friendfinder/**" _site/friendfinder && cpx "moviemap/**" _site/moviemap && cpx "popeclicker/**" _site/popeclicker && cpx "public/**" _site && cpx "src/assets/**" _site/assets && cpx "garagesale/dist/**" _site/garagesale && cpx "sampleballot/index.html" _site/sampleballot && cpx "sampleballot/assets/**" _site/sampleballot/assets && cpx "sampleballot/*.json" _site/sampleballot
